    • Constructor Detail

      • Entity

        public Entity(int x,
              int y,
              processing.core.PImage sprite,
              GameManager manager)
        Parameters:
        x - Pixel coordinate in the x direction.
        y - Pixel coordinate in the y direction.
        sprite - Sprite to be displayed.
        manager - To access the speed specified in config.json.

    • Method Detail

      • move

        public void move()
        Updates the x and y coordinates of the entity based on the current x and y velocity.

      • collide

        public boolean collide(java.util.List<java.util.List<GameObject>> map,
                       int d)
        Check if the entity is going to collide with an obstacle.
        Specified by:
        collide in class GameObject
        Parameters:
        map - Current map state
        d - Direction in which to check for a collision
        Returns:
        true if the entity is at the centre of its current cell and the direction it is headed is an obstacle and false otherwise.

      • setXVel

        public void setXVel(boolean direction)
        Setting the x velocity to positive or negative.
        Parameters:
        direction - If true, x velocity is positive. If false, x velocity is negative.

      • setYVel

        public void setYVel(boolean direction)
        Setting the y velocity to positive or negative.
        Parameters:
        direction - If true, y velocity is positive. If false, y velocity is negative.

        Update the cell coordinates of the entity based on its current pixel coordinates.

        public void setDirection(int d)
        Parameters:

        Gets the current direction
        Returns:

      • getXSpawn

        public int getXSpawn()
        Gets the x value of the original spawn point.
        Returns:
        integer representing the x position of the spawn point (pixel value).

      • getYSpawn

        Gets the y value of the original spawn point.
        Returns:
        integer representing the y position of the spawn point (pixel value).

      • tick

        public abstract void tick(GameManager manager)
        The entity logic that is performed every frame. This includes movement and collisions.
